title: Grozing Pliers
description: substract or add 1 to the value of a dice

title: Eglomise Brush
description: put a dice on your map without using the colour

title: Copper Foil Burnisher
description: put a dice on your map without using the value

title: Tap Wheel
description: change a dice with another dice that is in the round scheme

title: Flux Brush
description: choose a dice, throw it, if you can't put it on your map, put it in the reserve of dices

title: Glazing Hammer
description: throw all the dices in the reserve, you can do it only on your second turn before taking the second dice

title: Grozing Pliers
description: choose another dice in your first turn, you cannot make your second turn

title: Corkbacked Straightedge
description: choose a dice and put it in a cell that is not near the other dice

title: Grozing Pliers
description: change the face of a dice

title: Grozing Pliers
description: choose a dice, put it in the box and take another dice from the box

title: Grozing Pliers
description: move until two dice of one colour in the round scheme

title: Strip Cutter
description: take one dice from any other player, give them a dice of matching colour and value, they may place it ignoring the restriction it may be only used before round 7
